question/negations.des: Что = what. Subject question for objects.

part12.des: Present tense 'am' is omitted. 'дома' is adverbial.
'студент' is in the nominative case as subject complement.
'брат' is in the nominative case after 'это'.
'к' (to a person) uses the dative case: 'врачу'.

part1.des: Showing contrast between size and strength.

part2.des: Shows direction or movement into a side.
Indicates placement on top of something.

part3.des: Expresses continuation of a negative state.

part4.des: Asks for the identity of a person.
Asks about the person in charge.
Asks about an object or thing.
Asks about location in the past.
Asks about the position of a place.
Asks about the location of an object.
Asks for reason behind an action.

part5.des: Asks for the identity of a person.
Asks about the person in charge.
Asks about an object or thing.
Asks about location in the past.
Asks about the position of a place.

Asks for reason behind an action.

part6.des: Asks about identity of an object.
Describes the environment at this place.
Directs attention to a place farther away.
Asks about location of the listener.
Describes action of the group including speaker.
